channel.title: How do i add my custom background into the login background?
channel.description: How do i change the background login screen? Like, that background with animated fires, how do i change/remove that into my own custom image log-in screen??? I am a Noob-Coder :P :P :P and btw, just joined this site today :P

item.title: How do i add my custom background into the login background?
item.dc:creator: @pazazico pazazico
item.description:
@pazazico wrote:

Thank you! It works!

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add my custom background into the login background?

item.title: How do i add my custom background into the login background?
item.dc:creator: @Saphiroth Saphiroth
item.description:
@Saphiroth wrote:

[quote=“pazazico, post:3, topic:262366”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=346483.msg2669035#msg2669035 date=1234736841]
Just change your picture.
[/quote]
Lmao, that doesn’t help. It’s to do with something in a file i forgot.[/quote]

It does help,go to the sprite file thing and change the picture… Make sure it has the same name as the one before. Then compile.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add my custom background into the login background?

item.title: How do i add my custom background into the login background?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

It has to do with your picture…whatever picture you save, it uses that; but you must name it the same as before, or it can’t be found.

Read full topic
